page.title: 17LOCKS BOTTON
page.content: The main shopping centre of Locks Botton is Princess Parade.In Starts Hill there is an Out-Patients Departement ,for the Hospital.Starts Hill Close is just off Starts Hill where there are mostly modern houses,20 houses occupy this area .They are mostly detached .There are two public footpaths in Start Hill. We next surveyed Darrick Wood School.This is occupied by 272 mixed chidren between the ages of 7-11 years.There are 9 teachers plus 2 deaf for the deaf,and 1 Headmaster .They have many clubs and activities such as chess,bird watching,this is doneon the school grounds,gym and dance,done in the gym.Choir and band, these rehearse in the hall;netball and football is played on the school play ground.Every Christmas Darrick Wood puts on a play and every summer a fete.
